conclusion: Analyze initial conditions and effects of collisions to determine which blocks car A will collide with and where it will stop.

Car A will first collide with the blue cube as it moves from the right to the left.
The blue cube is in the path of the car, so the car will push the blue cube out of its way.
After pushing the blue cube, the car will continue to the left and will collide with the red cube.

After pushing the marble, the car will continue to the left and will come to a stop when it reaches the edge of the green surface.
